snippet: The Stratford Shakespeare Festival in Ontario announced that Antoni Cimolino would be its next artistic director, starting with the 2013 season.
abstract: Stratford Shakespeare Festival in Ontario, Canada, announces that its general director Antoni Cimolino will become the next artistic director, starting with the 2013 season.
lead_paragraph: The Stratford Shakespeare Festival in Ontario announced that Antoni Cimolino would be its next artistic director, starting with the 2013 season.
